XsSimpleVersion Class Reference

A class to store version information. More...

Public Member Functions

 XsSimpleVersion (int vmaj=0, int vmin=0, int vrev=0)
 Constructs a simple-version object using the supplied parameters or an empty version object if no parameters are given.
 
 XsSimpleVersion (const XsSimpleVersion &other)
 Constructs a simple-version object based upon the other object.
 
XsSimpleVersion & operator= (const XsSimpleVersion &other)
 Assign the simple-version from the other object.
 
bool operator== (const XsSimpleVersion &other) const
 Test if the other simple-version is equal to this.
 
bool operator!= (const XsSimpleVersion &other) const
 Test if the other simple-version is different to this.
 
bool operator< (const XsSimpleVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is lower than this. The comparison involves only the version numbers (major, minor and revision).
 
bool operator<= (const XsSimpleVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is lower or equal than this.
 
bool operator> (const XsSimpleVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is higher than this.
 
bool operator>= (const XsSimpleVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is higher or equal than this.
 
bool empty () const
 Test if this is a null-version.
 
int major () const
 Return the major part of the version.
 
int minor () const
 Return the minor part of the version.
 
int revision () const
 Return the revision part of the version.

(Note that these are not member functions.)

int XsSimpleVersion_empty (const XsSimpleVersion *)
 Test if this is a null-version.
 

Detailed Description

A class to store version information.
